DataElement.preferredDefinition: Expected amount of study medication taken.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

Concepts.definition: Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

DataElementConcept.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/25/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Expected; considered likely or probable.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueDomain.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 5/29/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.
